Article.Title: Years past deadline, Georgia will submit plan to close loophole in ...
Preview: Under pressure from the federal government, Georgia is rewriting a rule governing industrial air pollution limits to end a loophole that currently exposes communities near coal plants and other facilities to harmful pollutants.
Key.Author: Gautama Mehta

Article.Title: Fort Valley bus manufacturer expects $1 billion in EV funding ...
Preview: Joe Biden wants to be the “most pro-union” president in U.S. history. His massive green investment program is largely going to anti-union states like Georgia.
Key.Author: Gautama Mehta
